description: When expressed in base 2 and then interpreted in base 10, is a multiple of the original number.
comments: Note that A025612 is a subset of this sequence (numbers of form 2^i*10^j, with i, j >= 0).
example: 8 in base 2 is 1000, which interpreted in base 10 is 1000=125*8.
author: _Patrick De Geest_, April 1998
extensions: Example and better description from _Erich Friedman_, Jul 21 2001
